snippet: Sports bodies in the country were told that they would face cuts if female and male athletes did not travel in the same style when taking part in major events overseas.
abstract: Australian sports authorities warn country's sports bodies of consequences if female and male athletes do not receive equal travel accommodations for events abroad.
lead_paragraph: Sports bodies in the country were told that they would face cuts if female and male athletes did not travel in the same style when taking part in major events overseas.

headline.main: Australian Groups Warned on Gender Equality
